events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application requesting funds for medical expenses incurred recently.
The application has been categorized under Personal Loan based on keywords such as medical and personal use.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to handle the personal loan application and assist the applicant.
The initial review of the loan application was completed, verifying the purpose and basic eligibility criteria.
The applicant has been requested to submit proof of medical bills, identity, and income statements for further verification.
The applicant submitted all necessary documents including medical receipts, bank statements, and ID proofs as requested.
A credit check was completed, showing a satisfactory credit score and no significant outstanding debts.
Risk assessment report has been compiled, indicating moderate financial stability and manageable risk for loan approval.
The loan offer including interest rates, repayment schedule, and terms was presented to the applicant for review.
The applicant expressed satisfaction with the loan terms and agreed to proceed with the funding process.
The loan application has been approved following all compliance checks and applicant’s consent.
The approved loan amount has been disbursed to the applicant’s bank account as per the financial agreement.
A follow-up call was made to confirm receipt of funds and to discuss repayment schedule reminders.
The application has been formally closed after successful funding and initial follow-up steps completed satisfactorily.
